sdata.j: なに|ニヤニヤ|してるんだよ。↑何↑↓なに↓かいいことあったのか。
sdata.e: What are you smirking at? Did something good happen?

sdata.j: さっきからあの↑人↑↓ひと↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓で|にやにや|して。↑怪↑↓あや↓しい。
sdata.e: That person has had an odd grin on his face for a while. What do you suppose is behind it?

sdata.j: 「↑何↑↓なに↓|にやにや|してんの？」「↑今↑↓いま↓すれ↑違↑↓ちが↓った↑J↑↓じぇい↓↑K↑↓けい↓めっちゃかわいかった」
sdata.e: Why are you grinning like that? "That female high-school student I just passed by was really cute."

sdata.j: 「↑何↑↓なに↓|にやにや|してんの？」「↑今↑↓いま↓すれ↑違↑↓ちが↓った↑J↑↓じぇい↓↑K↑↓けい↓めっちゃかわいかった」
sdata.e: Why are you grinning? "The high school girls we just passed are really cute."

sdata.j: 「↑何↑↓なに↓|にやにや|してんの？」「↑今↑↓いま↓すれ↑違↑↓ちが↓った↑J↑↓じぇい↓↑K↑↓けい↓めっちゃかわいかった」
sdata.e: Why are you grinning like that?"That high school girl we just passed is really cute.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓|にやにや|してんの？ ↑気持↑↓きも↓ち↑悪↑↓わる↓い。
sdata.e: What are you grinning for like that? It creeps me out.

sdata.j: |ニヤニヤ|しちゃって↑何様↑↓なにさま↓かしら？
sdata.e: Who do you think you are to be grinning like that?
